briefTitle: Comparison Between ROLL Versus Magnetic Seed for Preoperative Localization of Non-palpable Breast Lesion by Randomized Clinical Study.
officialTitle: A Monocentric, Prospective, Randomized Clinical Study Comparing ROLL (Radioguided Occult Lesion Localization) With Magnetic Markers for Preoperative Localization of Non-palpable Breast Lesions in Patients Undergoing Breast Conservative Surgery.
